object.name: setUserEmojiStatus
object.description: Changes the emoji status for a given user that previously allowed the bot to manage their emoji status via the Mini App method requestEmojiStatusAccess. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Changes the emoji status for a given user that previously allowed the bot to manage their emoji status via the Mini App method requestEmojiStatusAccess. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Changes the emoji status for a given user that previously allowed the bot to manage their emoji status via the Mini App method `requestEmojiStatusAccess <https://core.telegram.org/bots/webapps#initializing-mini-apps>`_. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.name: user_id

annotations.description: Custom emoji identifier of the emoji status to set. Pass an empty string to remove the status.
annotations.html_description: Custom emoji identifier of the emoji status to set. Pass an empty string to remove the status.
annotations.rst_description: Custom emoji identifier of the emoji status to set. Pass an empty string to remove the status.
annotations.name: emoji_status_custom_emoji_id

annotations.description: Expiration date of the emoji status, if any
annotations.html_description: Expiration date of the emoji status, if any
annotations.rst_description: Expiration date of the emoji status, if any
annotations.name: emoji_status_expiration_date
